GSP28jsbh3-2u:1718: evaṃ samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhiṇopapāditasiddhāntopasaṃhāre kṛte punaḥ siṃhāvalokananyāyena tatra dūṣaṇamupanyasya tatparihāreṇa siddhāntamupapādayati -------- yadi tviti //
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1722: niṣṭheti sūtreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ pītodakaḥ ityādiṣviva niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipātāpattirastyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1726: tasyāṃ hi mandrābhibhūtirityārabhya varcasa ityantaṃ paṭhitvā “vasumadgaṇasya somadevate
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1727: matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandasa indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1728: madhumata upahatasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi rudravadgaṇasya somadevate mativido mādhyandinasya
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1729: savanasya triṣṭupchandasa indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1731: indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpitasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi”
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1733: tatrendrapītādipadānāṃ trayāṇāṃ somamātraparatve tattaddevatyapradānaśeṣabhakṣaṇe liṅgādeva tantrapadatayā tattatpadānāṃ prāptestrivāraṃ pāṭho 'narthakaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1735: sa pāṭhaḥ sārthaka iti pītapade lakṣaṇāyāḥ somasavanasaṃbandhiparatve 'syāṃ śākhāyāṃ
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1736: nirṇīte upasaṃhāranyāyena bhāṣyodāhṛtamantre 'pi tathaiva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1737: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ ------- vasumadgaṇādipadānāṃ asiddhavibhāgakaraṇapūrvako vyavasthayā tattatsavane viniyogo bhāṣyodāhṛtaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1738: taittirīyetu yathāsavanaṃ vibhāgasya svata eva siddhatvādyathāliṅgaṃ vyavasthāmātramiti tatpuruṣeṇaivātra siddhānta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1739: atraca “sarveṣāṃ vaikamantryamaitiśāyanasya bhaktipānatvāt savanādhikāro hī“ti siddhāntasūtre aitiśāyanagrahaṇādanyarṣeraikamantramiti mataṃ na jaimineḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1740: tasyatu yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayatītyādyapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇāyottarasūtrapratipāditohapakṣa eveti bhramaṃ nirākartumāha -------- kalpasūtreti //
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1743: paramatatvenokto 'pyaikamantryapakṣaḥ svasiddhānta eva yuktisiddhatvādato mīmāṃsānyāyavirodhe pūrvapakṣamūlatvāt kalpasūtrakāravacanasyānanuṣṭhānalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyamityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1744: ataeva --------- atrānte uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa evamaitiśāyana ācāryo manyate sma /
